WorkItem.Description:
I want to create a copy of an object so that I can edit the copy without affecting the original object. If everything is ok I copy the content of the copy to the original object. If aborted I just forget the copy and take the original object with its original values and references.
I thought  
Mapper.CreateMap<TypeA, TypeA>()
TypeA copy = Mapper.Map<TypeA, TypeA>( originalObject );
would do the job but after mapping copy and originalObject are the same/ have the same reference.
Â 
Is it possible to configure somehow the mapping to do what I want? Or does somebody know a better/other way?
